jd: From: Harry, Prospect Infosystem Inc harry@prospectinfosystem.com Reply to: harry@prospectinfosystem.com Dear All I represent Prospect Infosystem Inc. I found your resume online and wanted to reach out to you to see if the position below would be of any interest to you: I would appreciate it if you can connect back with me either by email at harry@prospectinfosystem.com Job Title: Java Programmer AnalystLocation: Richmond, VA (In person Interview)Duration: Long Term Job Description: This position will serve as a senior BACK-END application developer for the DMAS Information Management Division in the design, development, and maintenance of Java/ JEE based applications.Extensive practical experience in building enterprise applications using Java EE technologies.Expertise in Core Java concepts, such as OOP Design, Multi-Threading, Generics, Exception Handling, Collections, Java Reflection, Annotation.Understanding of relational database concepts with experience in Oracle.Experience developing with Git Workflows.Experience developing CI/CD pipelines and automation.Experience using Azure DevOps.Experience with Testing Frameworks such as Selenium, Cucumber, Playwright, JUnit and an understanding of Test Left approach to development.Experience with IBM SOA products like IIB/ACE, ODM, WAS, MQ, and ITXExperience with Front End Development using Node.js and Angular Details Required:Full Name: Phone: Email: Last 4 digits of SS#: Linked IN:Birthday (month & day only): Work Status in US: Location (city, state): Passport number:Availability to do a video interview: Availability to start: Current Situation / Reason for Looking: Full Address: 2 Professional References:Reference 1:Full Name:Client:Role:Email:Phone: Reference 2:Full Name:Client:Role:Email:Phone:
